mapper.select:
select * from lawcase where del_flag = 0 and is_bid_case = 1 and filed = 0 and approve_status = 2
and concat(ifnull(case_code,''),ifnull(case_name,'')) like concat('%',#{pattern},'%') escape'/'

select * from lawcase where case_id in
#{caseId}

select date_format(l.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as count_date, sum(case when l.approve_status=0 then '1' else '0' end) as count_approve_status_init, sum(case when l.approve_status=2 then '1' else '0' end) as count_approve_status_pass, sum(case when l.approve_status=6 then '1' else '0' end) as count_approve_status_agent, sum(case when l.approve_status=3 then '1' else '0' end) as count_approve_status_reject, sum(case when l.case_type='001' then '1' else '0' end) as count_civil_and_commercial_litigation, sum(case when l.case_type='002' then '1' else '0' end) as count_criminal_proceeding, sum(case when l.case_type='003' then '1' else '0' end) as count_foreign_litigation, sum(case when l.case_type='004' then '1' else '0' end) as count_administrative_case, sum(case when l.case_type='005' then '1' else '0' end) as count_contract_dispute, sum(case when l.case_type='006' then '1' else '0' end) as count_other, sum(case when l.case_type='007' then '1' else '0' end) as count_lawyer_letter, sum(case when l.case_type='008' then '1' else '0' end) as count_legal_counsel, sum(case when l.case_type='009' then '1' else '0' end) as count_special_legal_service, sum(case when l.case_type='010' then '1' else '0' end) as count_non_litigation_case, cast(sum(target) as decimal (19, 6) ) as count_target_of_entry from lawcase l where l.del_flag = 0 and date_format(l.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') group by date_format(l.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

select cast(sum(target) as decimal (19, 6)) as count_agency_target, date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as count_date from lawcase where del_flag = 0 and approve_status = 6 and date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')

select date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as count_date, count(1) as count_approve_status_current_date from lawcase where del_flag = 0 and date_format(create_time, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d') group by date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

select date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as count_date, count(1) as count_approve_status_last_year from lawcase where del_flag = 0 and date_format(date_add(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),interval 1 year),'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

select date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as count_date, count(1) as count_approve_status_last_week from lawcase where del_flag = 0 and date_format(date_add(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),interval 1 week),'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

select date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as count_date, sum(target) as count_target_current_date from lawcase where del_flag = 0 and date_format(create_time, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d') group by date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

select date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as count_date, sum(target) as count_target_last_year from lawcase where del_flag = 0 and date_format(date_add(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),interval 1 year),'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

select date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as count_date, sum(target) as count_target_last_week from lawcase where del_flag = 0 and date_format(date_add(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),interval 1 week),'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
